segments.text: In this indoor kitchen, the light from the window is bright.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is focused on her dish-drying routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink area has water running steadily from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's filling up and spilling over the basin edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming on the floor, reaching her shoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, a boy climbs the stool toward the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookie jar is open, his hand inside grabbing treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts slightly, but he keeps reaching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl stands below, palm up waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden outside the window appears serene and orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly on the counter nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back, letting in the daytime view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's a snapshot of quiet domestic activity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No one seems rushed or bothered in the moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
